name: Hotel De Monti

reviews.text: Very lovely and nice hotel from italy.i have a nice holiday and i like it very much .Helpful staff and central location.Hotel rooms and breakfast are beaitiful and nice for me .i can reccomend this hotel highly.i have a very nice experience...
reviews.title: Lovely place from lovely Rome.......

description: A brand new hotel in the heart of Rome, De Monti offers you 7 double rooms at the third floor of a 1500 building. Central location, clean rooms, where we will also serve you breakfast every day, and all the insider tips you can get the reception. The building has no lift.
